channel.title: How to
channel.description:
how do you add typing at the top of your screen like *SERVER NAME* *PLAYERS ONLINE- Ex. 50* and other messages how do i do that is there a tutorial to do that? please someone hook me up!
[IMG]http://i99.photobucket.com/albums/l287/Pikatchu/help.jpg[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2007, 06:01:02 PM[/size][hr]sorry for bumping this only time but i really need help

item.title: How to
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

Look on the TuT List
listen i am seeing of a lot of these posts... these are not helpful! if you want to get your post count up say something productive or nothing at all!

kk go into you autospawn.cfg and add these two to the top

spawn = 636	3252	3427	0	3252	3427	3252	3427	1	BANK	
spawn = 636	3255	3427	0	3255	3427	3255	3427	1	BANK
spawn = 797	3257	3432	0	2896	3512	2894	3510	2	Helemos

next go to your npchandler and search for

moo

under the last } add this

[code]
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
if (misc.random2(50) >= 17) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “<3 WE LOVE YOURscape <3!!!”;
}
}

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 797) {
if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "PLayers online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
